==Translingual==

===Etymology===
From [[咢]] ("[[beat]] a [[drum]]", reconstructed [[Old Chinese]] pronunciation ''*Ng[[ˤ]]ak''<!--Baxter-->) + [[阝]], the combinatorial form of [[邑]] ("[[area]]", "[[place]]").

===Han character===

{{wikipedia|E (state)}}

# a region of [[ancient]] [[China]] around [[Nanyang]] in present-day eastern [[Henan]]
# {{lb|cmn|abbreviation}} [[Hubei]] province in modern China
# [[startled]]
